name: Small Neighbour
description:
The Game:

As it turns out, when you are a stray cat, the closest thing to a family you have are the people who live in the places you roam on a daily basis. But a perk of not belonging anywhere is that you technically belong everywhere. As you live your daily cat life, interact with your friendly neighbourhood people and see how their lives change over time. Maybe you can even bring about some small changes... 

Choose how you want to interact with other people during the course of five days - ask for pats, scratch them or just meow. Your actions will have small, yet interesting results.

This game was originally made in 48 hours as an entry for Global Game Jam 2019.

Controls: 

WASD - Movement

Arrow Keys - Actions (press Down to activate the UI, then one of the other arrows to select your action or Down again to close it).
